definition: to be right next to/to lean closely against
tight/strict/close at hand/near/urgent/tense/hard up/short of money/to tighten
to lean against or on/to stand by the side of/to come near to/to depend on/to trust/to fuck (vulgar)/traditional military costume drama where the performers wear armor (old)

sentences.english: The mother laid the sleeping boy against her.
sentences.chinese: 母亲让睡着的男孩紧靠着她。

sentences.english: A filtrate collection box sits underneath, and seals against, the upper belt.
sentences.chinese: 滤液收集盒紧靠着上方皮带的下面密封。

sentences.english: His roommate’s bed was tightly close to the window, while he could only lie in bed all day long.
sentences.chinese: 病友的床紧靠着窗，而他只能终日平躺在床上。

sentences.english: Immediately inside the front door was the door of his sitting room.
sentences.chinese: 紧靠前门，里面的一扇门就是他的起居室的门。

sentences.english: He made his way to the elevators and went down to a storage area on the ground floor, next to the Pits.
sentences.chinese: 他走向升降梯下往底层的储存区，紧靠着深渊。

sentences.english: Against the new masonry I re-erected the old rampart of bones.
sentences.chinese: 再紧靠着这堵新墙，重新堆好尸骨。

sentences.english: The republic abuts on the lake.
The shop has frontage on 2 busy streets.
sentences.chinese: 这家商店紧靠着两条热闹的街道。

sentences.english: At the time I lived on 72nd Street, close to West End Avenue.
sentences.chinese: 当时我住在72号街，紧靠西区大街。

sentences.english: Legs closed together, slightly tilted to one side.
sentences.chinese: 双腿紧靠在一起，稍微倾斜到一边。

sentences.english: We all huddled together for awhile in silence.
sentences.chinese: 我们沉默地紧靠在一起一会儿。

sentences.english: Eventually you will come to Jinghsen Qanyie Road and the moat and wall of the Forbidden City.
sentences.chinese: 路的尽头就是紧靠故宫城墙和护城河的景山前街。

sentences.english: Scutica consisting of 3 pairs of kinetosomes, arranged in "Y"-shape.
sentences.chinese: 盾片由3对毛基粒彼此紧靠而成“Y”字形排布。

sentences.english: The field adjoins to the highway.
Outside the city next to the sea, the mountain road twists and turns and winds around.
sentences.chinese: 在城外紧靠大海的地方，山路迂回曲折，四处延伸。

sentences.english: She leaned on my chest. We were so close that I could smell the fragrance of her blouse.
sentences.chinese: 她紧靠在我的胸口，我闻到她上衣里散发的香味。

definition: to be right next to/close neighbor
one side/other/different/lateral component of a Chinese character (such as 刂[dao1], 亻[ren2] etc)
to be located at/to be situated in
to be located at/to be situated at/to lie
